name: Buried Olive
description:
**This game was an hour late to be entered, thanks to everyone who watched me reupload the same broken version multiple times!

 Olive it to you to decide what you think about the game.

Got the keys the wrong way round on the 1st chapter, they went a bit inversed.
And Chapter 2 Wanted Dead or Olive is busted.
Fixes are in place so will upload the fixed copy as soon as voting is finished.

There will be more Olive Jam streams to follow.

Created for Jamoween 2, an 8 day game Jam hosted by the Indie Game Squad. Check them out at https://www.indiegamesquad.co.uk/
